# collectionView(_:numberOfItemsInSection:)

**Instance Method**

Asks your data source object for the number of items in the specified section.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func collectionView(_ collectionView: UICollectionView, numberOfItemsInSection section: Int) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **collectionView**: The collection view requesting this information.
- **section**: An index number identifying a section in `collectionView`. This index value is 0-based.

## Return Value

The number of items in `section`.

## Getting item and section metrics

- **numberOfSections(in:)**: Asks your data source object for the number of sections in the collection view.
